194898808537235457.text: "I think what we're building here is a network to protect networks" - @EFF's Cindy Cohn at #hacksociety

194884565750398976.text: "Can we make it critical to succeed in the meme generation?" @wseltzer at #hacksociety

194884519864700930.text: OH at #hacksociety: "If we can get everyone in 4chan to focus on community broadband, then we'd be done .. "

194882081787101184.text: The narrative of the internet is informed by numbers, facts, and real people. - @jeffjarvis at #hacksociety

194878618873249795.text: "One of the things the internet's good at is telling stories" -@nickgrossman at #hacksociety

194878064721805313.text: Any economists working on measuring the size of the internet economy? If so, @timoreilly would like to hear from you.

194875808240779266.text: And, we're back up for Session 3 of Hacking Society: http://hackingsociety.us  #hacksociety

194869105663283201.text: "What sorts of tools can we build" to inspire advocacy at the end of networks? asks @bethnoveck at #hacksociety

194865479364517888.text: "We've taken our values and blasted them into society .. " -@msurman on the last ~20 years of the internet at #hacksociety

194864940354519040.text: "The value of a network accrues to the network, not to the company at the center of the network" -@albertwenger at #hacksociety

194863448256020480.text: "You want to create a Delaware-corporate law of the internet" -Luigi Zingales at #hacksociety "That's Iceland!" someone else responds.

194856867606966272.text: "Our challenge is to have a Congress that is as open .. as the web that we want and advocate for." - Jayme White at #hacksociety

194855134281465856.text: "For every SOPA we nail and CISPA we miss, there's 50 other things that are brewing." -@nickgrossman at #hacksociety

194851742997942272.text:
OH: "The goals are prosperity, human rights and democracy, right?" 

"And blazing broadband."

194850234982080513.text: "The past in general is over-represented in Washington. The future has no lobbyists." -Rep. Jim Cooper at #hacksociety

194849720831705089.text: "PIPA/SOPA was a victory after 20 years of defeat" -@lessig at #hacksociety

194848557507944448.text: "Let's make the most attractive product to bring our standards into the market" -@msurman on adoption of web standards #hacksociety

194848231035908096.text: "How do you compete a competitive space in a space with strong network effects?" asks @EFF's Cindy Cohn at #hacksociety

194847756127436800.text: Attacks come at different internet layers, often aimed at weakest links, says Cindy Cohn @EFF. Gave example of Wikileaks/payment processors

194847344695586816.text: "Institutions will work to preserve the problem to which they are the solution." - @cshirky at #hacksociety

194845755972915200.text: -@timoreilly's original business model: "interesting work for interesting people" #hacksociety

194845133290745857.text: "Building something by and for the participants changes the way you think" - @timoreilly at #hacksociety

194843288417746945.text: "By being ignorant of our competition, we built a site we wanted to be built" -@kn0thing on Reddit at #hacksociety

194842708244832256.text: "You're in the business of making your own customers smarter" says @cshirky re @Etsy, @Kickstarter, & other non-confusopoly biz #hacksociety

194842240189870080.text: "We created a space, and we've invited people to come and use, it but we don't want to do much more than that" -@ystrickler on @Kickstarter

194841446740803585.text: "We like that it's a space that's all us. Everyone is the audience." -@ystrickler on @Kickstarter at #hacksociety

194840966660759554.text: -@Kickstarter changes the question from "Will this produce revenue?" to "Do I want this to exist?" #hacksociety

194839887969648641.text: And, we're back up for Session 2 of Hacking Society: http://hackingsociety.us  #hacksociety

194826021437059072.text: We've posted our schedule on http://hackingsociety.us   We'll be breaking for lunch shortly, and will resume the stream at 1:15pm. #hacksociety

194821993068118016.text: Hypothesis from @fredwilson at #hacksociety: "The sustainable networks on the internet .. are at odds w the notions of capitalism."

194821272528625665.text: "Definitions are insurance policies against risk, and no insurance policy is failsafe." -@thepublicdomain #hacksociety

194820025243279362.text: “Democracy tends to be a system where identity is low & group communication is high. [The internet] is in an inverse” @cshirky #hacksoiety

194819438145576960.text: -@cshirky on internet democracy at #hacksociety: "the work is being done by the people who show up"

194818713856380928.text: "What are these principles of the society we want to build?" asks @jeffjarvis at #hacksociety

194817339903062016.text: "People felt committed to defend [networked] services in a way they wouldn't in a customer/supplier relationship" @bradusv #hacksociety

194815003017216000.text: "Facebook and Google have morphed; they react to their constituents in ways they can’t identify themselves" -@jpbarlow #hacksociety

194814713501200384.text: "The idea these large institutional networks have risen up on the internet and will be there forever is flawed." -@fredwilson #hacksociety

194814371803832320.text: "People have the same relationship with the intenet as they do with a store. It’s part of their personal identity." -Jayme White

194813818612883457.text: "How can we foster small-scale creativity & individual passion when that's in contention w growing network effects?" @wseltzer #hacksociety

194811563109134336.text: "Goldman Sachs wasn't created by the internet, but it's brand may be destroyed by the internet" -@aweissman at #hacksociety

194810650059481088.text: "The internet is very efficient at regulating itself and expanding its own interest." -@fightfortheftr #hacksociety

194810429497819136.text: "The SOPA/PIPA fight showed that the network can defend itself" -@fightfortheftr #hacksociety

194810338305261568.text: "The internet offers ways to break up power .. the tools are there to disrupt concentrations of power." -@fightfortheftr #hacksociety

194809261635805185.text: “Part of the effort to maintain openness.. is not just economic. It is also a market for influence.” -@bradusv #hackingsociety

194805734704291841.text: " .. The real challenge is to create better institutions in the aftermath." -@timoreilly #hackingsociety

194805649811587072.text: “Networks destroy existing institutions, and new institutions will develop on top of them.” -@timoreilly #hackingsociety

194804981457620994.text: "If we had to put down money on whether it’ll be the web or institutions that will win, it will be the web." -@ystrickler #hacksociety
